001package com.telos.loops.transactional;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import com.telos.loops.error.LoopsValidationException;
005import jakarta.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Map;
008
009/**
010 * Request to send a transactional email via Loops.
011 *
012 * <p>
013 * Transactional emails are sent immediately to a specific recipient. You must
014 * provide the email
015 * template ID and recipient email address. Dynamic data can be included via
016 * dataVariables to
017 * personalize the email content.
018 *
019 * <p>
020 * Example usage:
021 *
022 * <pre>{@code
023 * TransactionalSendRequest request = new TransactionalSendRequest(
024 *     "clxyz123abc", // transactionalId (required)
025 *     "user@example.com", // email (required)
026 *     true, // addToAudience
027 *     Map.of("resetLink", "https://example.com/reset/token123"), // dataVariables
028 *     List.of(new Attachment("invoice.pdf", "application/pdf", "base64data...")) // attachments
029 * );
030 * }</pre>
031 *
032 * @param transactionalId the ID of the transactional email template to send
033 *                        (required)
034 * @param email           the recipient's email address (required)
035 * @param addToAudience   whether to add this recipient to your audience if they
036 *                        don't exist
037 * @param dataVariables   map of variable names to values for template
038 *                        personalization
039 * @param attachments     list of file attachments to include with the email
040 */
041@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
042public record TransactionalSendRequest(
043    @Nonnull String transactionalId,
044    @Nonnull String email,
045    Boolean addToAudience,
046    Map<String, Object> dataVariables,
047    List<Attachment> attachments) {
048
049  /**
050   * Compact constructor with validation.
051   *
052   * @throws LoopsValidationException if transactionalId or email is null or blank
053   */
054  public TransactionalSendRequest {
055    if (transactionalId == null || transactionalId.isBlank()) {
056      throw new LoopsValidationException("transactionalId is required and cannot be blank");
057    }
058    if (email == null || email.isBlank()) {
059      throw new LoopsValidationException("email is required and cannot be blank");
060    }
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Represents a file attachment for a transactional email.
065   *
066   * @param filename    the name of the file (e.g., "invoice.pdf")
067   * @param contentType the MIME type of the file (e.g., "application/pdf",
068   *                    "image/png")
069   * @param data        the base64-encoded file data
070   */
071  @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
072  public record Attachment(String filename, String contentType, String data) {
073  }
074}
